entry.title: Entry #77 in X Corp. v. Apple Inc., 4:25-cv-00914
entry.summary: LETTER OF REQUEST FOR INTERNATIONAL JUDICIAL ASSISTANCE PURSUANT TO THE HAGUE CONVENTION ON THE TAKING OF EVIDENCE ABROAD IN CIVIL OR COMMERCIAL MATTERS TO OBTAIN EVIDENCE FROM KAKAO CORPORATION (Clerk Note: See order for specific details.) (Ordered by Judge Mark Pittman on 11/25/2025) (saw) Modified docket text on 12/1/2025 (saw). (Entered: 12/01/2025)

entry.title: Entry #76 in X Corp. v. Apple Inc., 4:25-cv-00914
entry.summary: ORDER: Before the Court is Plaintiffs' Unopposed Motion for Withdrawal and Substitution of Local Counsel. ECF No. 74 . The Motion is GRANTED. Added attorney Noah M. Schottenstein for X Corp. Noah M. Schottenstein for X.AI LLC. Attorney Robert Rowe; Monica Gaudioso and Alex More terminated. (Ordered by Judge Mark Pittman on 12/1/2025) (saw) (Entered: 12/01/2025)

entry.title: Entry #75 in X Corp. v. Apple Inc., 4:25-cv-00914
entry.summary: ORDER GRANTING MOTION FOR ISSUANCE OF LETTER OF REQUEST FOR INTERNATIONAL JUDICIAL ASSISTANCE PURSUANT TO THE HAGUE CONVENTION ON THE TAKING OF EVIDENCE ABROAD IN CIVIL OR COMMERCIAL MATTERS 72 : Upon consideration of Plaintiffs' Motion for Issuance of Letter of Request for International Judicial Assistance Pursuant to the Hague Convention on the Taking of Evidence Abroad in Civil or Commercial Matters, the Motion is hereby GRANTED and the Court APPROVES the proposed Letter of Request included with the Motion. (Ordered by Judge Mark Pittman on 11/26/2025) (wxc) (Entered: 11/26/2025)

entry.title: Entry #74 in X Corp. v. Apple Inc., 4:25-cv-00914

entry.title: Entry #70 in X Corp. v. Apple Inc., 4:25-cv-00914
entry.summary: ORDER: Before the Court is Defendants' Unopposed Motion to Extend Deadline to Answer Plaintiffs' Complaint. ECF No. 69 . The Motion is hereby GRANTED. The deadline to answer is extended to December 11, 2025. (Ordered by Judge Mark Pittman on 11/18/2025) (saw) (Entered: 11/18/2025)

entry.title: Entry #69 in X Corp. v. Apple Inc., 4:25-cv-00914
entry.summary: Unopposed Motion for Extension of Time to File Answer for Defendants Apple and OpenAI filed by Apple Inc (Wisenberg, Julia) (Entered: 11/17/2025)

entry.title: Entry #68 in X Corp. v. Apple Inc., 4:25-cv-00914
entry.summary: ORDER: Before the Court are Defendant Apple Inc.'s Motion to Dismiss, ECF No. 36, and the Motion of Defendants OpenAI, Inc., OpenAI, LLC, and OpenAI OPCO, LLC to Dismiss the Complaint Pursuant to Rule 12(B)(6), ECF No. 40 . The Motions are hereby DENIED. This Order should not be construed as a judgment (or pre-judgment) on the merits of this litigation. (Ordered by Judge Mark Pittman on 11/13/2025) (saw) (Entered: 11/13/2025)
